message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high value and quality, I understand it might seem pricey, but I assure you it's worth every penny. Considering its worth to you, I propose a special introductory price of $120. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in the product's ability to meet your needs. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations, and we can proceed with the transaction.
